verses.kjv: And Joshua rose early in the morning; and they removed from Shittim, and came to Jordan, he and all the children of Israel, and lodged there before they passed over.
verses.web: Joshua got up early in the morning; and they moved from Shittim and came to the Jordan, he and all the children of Israel. They camped there before they crossed over.
verses.ct: Joshua got up early the next morning, and he and all the Israelites broke camp at Shittim and traveled to the Jordan River. They camped there along the bank before crossing.

verses.kjv: And it came to pass after three days, that the officers went through the host;
verses.web: After three days, the officers went through the middle of the camp;
verses.ct: After 3 days, the officers went through the camp with instructions.

verses.kjv: And they commanded the people, saying, When ye see the ark of the covenant of the LORD your God, and the priests the Levites bearing it, then ye shall remove from your place, and go after it.
verses.web: and they commanded the people, saying, “When you see the ark of LORD your God’s covenant, and the Levitical priests bearing it, then leave your place and follow it.
verses.ct: They told the people, "When you see the ark of the covenant of the LORD your God being carried by the Levitical priests, leave your positions and follow it."

verses.kjv: Yet there shall be a space between you and it, about two thousand cubits by measure: come not near unto it, that ye may know the way by which ye must go: for ye have not passed this way heretofore.
verses.web: Yet there shall be a space between you and it of about two thousand cubits by measure—don’t come closer to it—that you may know the way by which you must go; for you have not passed this way before.”
verses.ct: "But keep a distance of about 2,000 cubits between you and the ark — don't get any closer. That way you'll be able to see where it goes and know which direction to travel, since you've never been this way before."

verses.kjv: And Joshua said unto the people, Sanctify yourselves: for to morrow the LORD will do wonders among you.
verses.web: Joshua said to the people, “Sanctify yourselves; for tomorrow LORD will do wonders among you.”
verses.ct: Then Joshua told the people, "Set yourselves apart and prepare, because tomorrow the LORD is going to do amazing things among you."

verses.kjv: And Joshua spake unto the priests, saying, Take up the ark of the covenant, and pass over before the people. And they took up the ark of the covenant, and went before the people.
verses.web: Joshua spoke to the priests, saying, “Take up the ark of the covenant, and cross over before the people.” They took up the ark of the covenant, and went before the people.
verses.ct: Joshua told the priests, "Pick up the ark of the covenant and walk ahead of the people." So they lifted the ark and took their place at the front.

verses.kjv: And the LORD said unto Joshua, This day will I begin to magnify thee in the sight of all Israel, that they may know that, as I was with Moses, so I will be with thee.
verses.web: LORD said to Joshua, “Today I will begin to magnify you in the sight of all Israel, that they may know that as I was with Moses, so I will be with you.
verses.ct: The LORD said to Joshua, "Today I will begin to make you great in the eyes of all Israel, so they will know that I am with you the same way I was with Moses."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt command the priests that bear the ark of the covenant, saying, When ye are come to the brink of the water of Jordan, ye shall stand still in Jordan.
verses.web: You shall command the priests who bear the ark of the covenant, saying, ‘When you come to the brink of the waters of the Jordan, you shall stand still in the Jordan.’ ”
verses.ct: "Give this command to the priests carrying the ark of the covenant: 'When you reach the edge of the Jordan's waters, walk in and stand still right there in the river.'"

verses.kjv: And Joshua said unto the children of Israel, Come hither, and hear the words of the LORD your God.
verses.web: Joshua said to the children of Israel, “Come here, and hear the words of LORD your God.”
verses.ct: Joshua called the Israelites together and said, "Come here and listen to the words of the LORD your God."

verses.kjv: And Joshua said, Hereby ye shall know that the living God is among you, and that he will without fail drive out from before you the Canaanites, and the Hittites, and the Hivites, and the Perizzites, and the Girgashites, and the Amorites, and the Jebusites.
verses.web: Joshua said, “By this you shall know that the living God is among you, and that he will without fail drive the Canaanite, the Hittite, the Hivite, the Perizzite, the Girgashite, the Amorite, and the Jebusite out from before you.
verses.ct: Joshua continued, "This is how you'll know that the living God is right here among you — and that he will absolutely drive out the Canaanites, the Hittites, the Hivites, the Perizzites, the Girgashites, the Amorites, and the Jebusites from the land ahead of you."

verses.kjv: Behold, the ark of the covenant of the LORD of all the earth passeth over before you into Jordan.
verses.web: Behold, the ark of the covenant of the Lord of all the earth passes over before you into the Jordan.
verses.ct: "Look — the ark of the covenant of the Lord of all the earth is about to cross into the Jordan ahead of you."

verses.kjv: Now therefore take you twelve men out of the tribes of Israel, out of every tribe a man.
verses.web: Now therefore take twelve men out of the tribes of Israel, for every tribe a man.
verses.ct: "Now choose 12 men from the tribes of Israel, one from each tribe."

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, as soon as the soles of the feet of the priests that bear the ark of the LORD, the LORD of all the earth, shall rest in the waters of Jordan, that the waters of Jordan shall be cut off from the waters that come down from above; and they shall stand upon an heap.
verses.web: It shall be that when the soles of the feet of the priests who bear the ark of LORD, the Lord of all the earth, rest in the waters of the Jordan, that the waters of the Jordan will be cut off. The waters that come down from above shall stand in one heap.”
verses.ct: "The moment the feet of the priests carrying the ark of the LORD — the Lord of all the earth — touch the Jordan's waters, the river will be cut off. The water flowing downstream will stop and pile up in a single mass."

verses.kjv: And it came to pass, when the people removed from their tents, to pass over Jordan, and the priests bearing the ark of the covenant before the people;
verses.web: When the people moved from their tents to pass over the Jordan, the priests who bore the ark of the covenant being before the people,
verses.ct: So the people broke camp to cross the Jordan, with the priests carrying the ark of the covenant leading the way.

verses.kjv: And as they that bare the ark were come unto Jordan, and the feet of the priests that bare the ark were dipped in the brim of the water, (for Jordan overfloweth all his banks all the time of harvest,)
verses.web: and when those who bore the ark had come to the Jordan, and the feet of the priests who bore the ark had dipped in the edge of the water (for the Jordan overflows all its banks all the time of harvest),
verses.ct: Now the Jordan was at flood stage, overflowing its banks throughout the entire harvest season. But as soon as the priests carrying the ark reached the river and their feet touched the water's edge,

verses.kjv: That the waters which came down from above stood and rose up upon an heap very far from the city Adam, that is beside Zaretan: and those that came down toward the sea of the plain, even the salt sea, failed, and were cut off: and the people passed over right against Jericho.
verses.web: the waters which came down from above stood, and rose up in one heap a great way off, at Adam, the city that is beside Zarethan; and those that went down toward the sea of the Arabah, even the Salt Sea, were wholly cut off. Then the people passed over near Jericho.
verses.ct: the water flowing from upstream stopped and rose up in a massive wall far away near the city of Adam, which is next to Zaretan. The water flowing downstream toward the Sea of the Arabah — the Salt Sea — was completely cut off. And the people crossed over on the riverbed directly across from Jericho.

verses.kjv: And the priests that bare the ark of the covenant of the LORD stood firm on dry ground in the midst of Jordan, and all the Israelites passed over on dry ground, until all the people were passed clean over Jordan.
verses.web: The priests who bore the ark of LORD’s covenant stood firm on dry ground in the middle of the Jordan; and all Israel crossed over on dry ground, until all the nation had passed completely over the Jordan.
verses.ct: The priests carrying the ark of the covenant of the LORD stood firmly on dry ground right in the middle of the Jordan while all of Israel crossed over on dry ground — until every last person had made it completely across the river.
